meanings.definition: A person who prepares something, such as food or a document.
meanings.sent1: The preparers in the kitchen were busy chopping vegetables for the soup.
meanings.sent2: The preparers at the office meticulously organized the documents for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The preparers accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: The preparers of the feast sprinkled magic into every dish they created.
meanings.sent5: The preparers of the meal infused love and care into every recipe they crafted.

meanings.definition: Those who make something ready for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The preparers of the event set up the decorations with precision and care.
meanings.sent2: The preparers of the experiment ensured all equipment was in place before starting.
meanings.sent3: The preparers of the surprise party accidentally popped the balloons too early.
meanings.sent4: The preparers of the stage transformed it into a magical wonderland for the performance.
meanings.sent5: The preparers of the exhibition arranged each artwork to perfection for the opening night.
